title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table show different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Check the format of the datetime values in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
